summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 FORD MUSTANG. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBERS: 15V319000 (AIR BAGS) AND 16V384000 (AIR BAGS). THE PARTS FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS) WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE LOCAL DEALER (SUMMERVILLE FORD 9700 DORCHESTER RD, SUMMERVILLE, SC 29485 (877) 477-1434) WAS CONTACTED AND CONFIRMED THAT THE PARTS FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 15V319000 (AIR BAGS) WERE AVAILABLE, BUT PARTS FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS) WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND WAS NOT ABLE TO CONFIRM WHEN THE PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAG PARTS WERE TO BECOME AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAGS NOT AVAILABLE.
